description:
In this course titled ' NLP- Learn The Language Of Persuasion Using Simple NLP ' By Pradeep Aggarwal you will learn many techniques using Neuro Linguistic Programming ( NLP ) to improve and enhance your persuasion skills easily and effortlessly. You will be able to increase your sales and also it will be helpful to you in building and improving your relationships with people in general. You will come better in persuasion and help influence people for your benefit .

This course contains 10 lectures and over 30 minutes of live recorded videos for your benefit.

This course includes -

  • Introduction
  • Quoting Others Technique
  • Embedded Command Technique
  • Negative Command Technique
  • Mind Or Double Mind Technique
  • How To Use Presuppositions
  • Telling Stories Technique
  • Yes Set Technique
  • Anchoring Technique
  • Summary Of The Course
title: NLP- Learn The Language Of Persuasion Using Simple NLP
